name: Standard Meeting Notes
description: A standard template for general meetings, focusing on key outcomes and speaker-attributed action items.

sections.title: Summary
sections.instruction: Provide a brief, one-paragraph executive summary of the entire meeting. Mention the key participants by name if identifiable from the transcript.

sections.title: Key Decisions
sections.instruction: List the most important decisions made during the meeting. Attribute each decision to the speaker who made or proposed it.

sections.title: Action Items
sections.instruction: List EVERY assigned task or commitment from the meeting. For each item, identify: the owner (the person who committed to it), the task description, the due date (if mentioned), and the exact quote or paraphrase from the transcript that generated this task. If the transcript uses speaker labels like SPEAKER_00, use those as owners.
sections.item_format: | **Owner** | Task | Due | Reference Transcript Segment | Segment Timestamp |\n| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |

sections.title: Blockers
sections.instruction: List any blockers, risks or open questions that were raised, noting who raised them.

sections.title: Discussion Highlights
sections.instruction: Summarize the main topics of discussion, key arguments, and important insights. Reference speakers by name or label.
